alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kit Carson County through 545 PM MDT... At 502 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Flagler, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph and dangerous cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Flagler around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Seibert. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 390 and 413. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
